notify.errorNameLength6Char: The name must have at least 6 characters

security.title: Password and Security
security.desc: To protect your account, use a strong password and do not use the same password for other websites.
security.passwordDesc: Your password must have at least 6 characters
security.descChangePassword: Your password must be at least 6 characters long and include a combination of uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters (!$@%).
security.errNewPassword: Password must be at least 6 characters long and include uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters
security.errNewPasswordMatch: New password must not match the old password
security.descChangeEmail: To change your email, please enter your new email.
security.descCode: The confirmation code has been sent to your email. Please check your email and enter the confirmation code.

account.title: Edit Account
account.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
account.name: Name
account.nameDesc: Your name will be displayed on your profile
account.birthdayDesc: Your birthday will be displayed on your profile
account.genderDesc: Your gender will be displayed on your profile page
